channel.title: Forever Alone
channel.description:
Last night i was in my room and my sister walked in and we started having a conversation that went like this: Sister - Are you looking forward to school tomorrow? Me - No... yeeaaahh Sister - Why? Me - Cause i can see my friends and stuff Sister - Jacinta? Me - *sad face* Forever alone...
I said this because she only mentioned one of my friends and it sounding like i didn't have any, it was the funniest moment all night. Have you ever had a moment where you've actually said IRL 'Forever alone'? Funny or not, share!

item.title: Forever Alone
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:34, topic:431539”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=534217.msg3906814#msg3906814 date=1328318546]

There’s this kid at lunch at ALWAYS sits by himself and we call him the ‘Forever alone’ kid.

You go to my school?

I try to talk to this kid & he literally flips his tray & starts attempting to hit me.

Sad story’s, There is this girl in our school that always says awnsers in the class but 90% off the time she got it wrong (Or dumb question…)
No one hangs around with her and she doesnt really got friends, I feel bad for her but I cant help her

This makes me mad.

She is so pissed off that when you even look to her in the class she starts freaking out and then the teacher gets mad cuz they all support her…
She had a 10 sport from our sport teacher and she was bad as hell…

God I hate it when teachers yell at you for freaking out on the weird kid. I was treating her like a normal person would treat another person but I was ostracized for it. I kicked her violin cus she was being annoying.
[/quote]

You’re an ass.[/quote]

No, you weren’t there. She constantly talked about the little mermaid and I told her politely to be quiet and she wouldn’t listen. I said shutup after the 3rd or fourth try and the teacher flipped a shit on me. Then one day I got so pissed I started kicking her violin (which was in a case). Awe the wonderful memories of 6th grade.

Read full topic

item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:22, topic:431539”]Sounds like an Asian kid we have at school always drinking coke, he is really short and were in year 10. If u see my pic he comes up to my chest.

Anywayz there was also another Asian who was wierd and all these hot chicks were surrounding him coz he was loner so I went to talk to him (not just him) and uhm I was like when I was in yr7 I wasn’t that short, an then he started calling me racist and I explained to him that I wasn’t brig racist and shit like that, the girls started to walk away coz him being weid and shit and I did too, guess the kids forever alone[/quote]

A bunch of hot girls surrounding him != forever alone buddy.

item.title: Forever Alone
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:21, topic:431539”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=534217.msg3906317#msg3906317 date=1328249166]
loner with a boner
[/quote]
Oh if only, can’t even get it up!

There is this new chick at our school now and basically she’s one of those really nerdy looking kids with braces and stuff, she drinks a lot of coke too. Today one of the school captains which is a mate of my mate comes up and asks us if she can hang with us, this girl is completely weird (not a good weird like a completely strange awkward weird). She was making jokes that no one was laughing at and being contently interrupted by the other 2 in the group, was kind of funny.

Earlier in the morning i mentioned how we had a new kid and my mates like ‘well at least she isn’t a whore’, i laughed so hard it was sad but it was so true. The point is, she’s a forever aloner too. :([/quote]sounds hot give me her #

Read full topic
